comment: Dude. No.  You don't apply CSS and expect me to use this? Hell no. Even if there was no JS I'd be fine but this looks hideous. Oh, and please allow using keyboards, and don't use only voice input. Eg. The touchone keyboard

reply.content: Hi, Normally it should load the Web page, may you can contact us via mail? Keyboard is planned as soon as the new wear update will released

comment: Thanks!
title: Does the job.

author: Manuel Ferran
comment: Fast, easy to use and doesn't freeze the watch, which was my biggest complain about WIB. Add CSS2 support maintaining current performance and you have the best android wear internet browser. GOOD WORK!
title: Functional

comment: Really lightweigt. Up to rendering whole thing unusable... One star for NOT asking any priviledges.

comment: The experience is nowhere near ideal. That said, if you were looking for ideal, you wouldn't be trying to surf on your phone. Great app with lots of promise.
